briefdescription.para: The time step type we return every time a step in the environment is performed.
The type describing the state space for the environment.
The type of the action space for the environment.
The type of the action to be undertaken in the environment.
Flag indicating if the environment has been created.
step in the environment by performing the given action

parameterdescription.para: The action to execute in the environment

briefdescription.para: Reset the environment always using the same seed.
is_created Returns true is make has been called successfully
The number of agents acting in the environment.
Helper function to set the version. To be called only when the make is called.
